meta.job_title: Assistant Director, Recruiting & Admissions - Business Programs

duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet or exceed enrollment targets for assigned business programs.
Build and foster relationships with prospective students and feeder organizations.
Cultivate and shepherd prospective students through the admissions process to enrollment for degree completion or graduate level business programs.
Coordinate all recruiting tactics on behalf of each adult/graduate program represented in partnership with the DEO and program leadership.
Provide input to create strategic marketing plans for each program represented.
Work effectively within the various computer systems used to track prospective student progress through the application process.
Maintain strong working knowledge of program-specific admissions requirements and information.
Represent the College at various recruiting events and meet with students on and off campus.

Coordinate with the Director of Recruitment, Executive Director, and Program(s) faculty to seek out and build strategic partnerships in the local/regional community and with out-of-state partners and institutions.
Leverage social media tools to build a network/database of contacts.
